first_story_block:
"Alright, men, you are about to be thrown into the worst war imaginable. Some of you may be wounded, some may not even come back at all. But you will fight and die proudly for your country! Do you understand!?!"


 

Everyone looks terrified, but you shout, "Yes, sir!" all the same. "Good! Now pick up your weapons and let's go to battle!" You all walk over to the armoury, put on your basic armour and collect your standard sword, bow and quiver of arrows.


Then you head out to fight.
